skins.shipDescription: Admiral Hipper-class Heavy Cruiser, Prinz Eugen
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Prinz Eugen, the miracle of the Third Reich and the third ship of the Admiral Hipper-class heavy cruisers. I will survive any battle, no matter how fierce. Luck? You sure have some guts.
skins.acquisition: Hmm... so you're the Commander? How long can you keep me amused? I'm looking forward to it.
skins.login: Hmm~ What is it? How would you like me to train you today?
skins.secretaryIdle1: If you overwork yourself too much... you ~ will ~ die.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Lucky ship? Are you mocking me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Operation Rheinübung? Looking back, that was how it all began for me.
skins.secretaryTouch: Have you finished having your fun?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Now then, it's my turn to have a taste of you.

skins.shipDescription: If fate brought us together, then it has my thanks… I look forward to our future together~
skins.acquisition: If fate brought us together, then it has my thanks… I look forward to our future together~
skins.login: Commander, you did not happen to peek at other girls while on the way here, right? ~~
skins.details: In Ironblood, we also use animal nicknames to call our lovers, like teddy bear or little bunny or something else. So Commander, do you want me to call you teddy bear or little bunny?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ugh... my body suddenly feels so weak... I’d only recover if you give me a kiss, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Don’t overstretch yourself at work ~ otherwise… my loneliness will drive me to tease you.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I feel so lucky right now --- why you ask? Take--a--guess, dear?
skins.secretaryTouch: I know what’s on your mind, Commander...but we need to focus on work right now.

skins.shipDescription: Relaxing on a float, gently licking my lips... is this really the most popular photo pose for the beach? Wales, you’re not teasing me again, are you?
skins.acquisition: Relaxing on a float, gently licking my lips... is this really the most popular photo pose for the beach? Wales, you’re not teasing me again, are you?
skins.login: Commander, I am practicing my smile. Someone said it looks unnatural, but what do you think?
skins.details: Woah! I got a pretty dark tan after playing with Wales all day...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Wales, someone is going to break your hand again if you keep messing with Bismarck! I won't plead for you this time...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Despite her devil-may-care attitude, Wales is actually quite reliable. In fact, she helps me all the time, even though we were once enemies...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I went and told Hipper about our beach day, and all she said was, 'Why do I need to be jealous about your thin, lewd, and non-combat-ready swimming suit?' Haha, that's so like her!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, have you seen Wales? That rascal, she ditched me again!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: There are a lot of good things about Wales, but please avoid picking up her bad habits.

skins.shipDescription: So this is the Sakura Empire's New Year? Hehe, how interesting~ Commander, since it's the New Year, why don't you put aside all those papers and have a drink with me?
skins.acquisition: So this is the Sakura Empire's New Year? Hehe, how interesting~ Commander, since it's the New Year, why don't you put aside all those papers and have a drink with me?
skins.details: Frohes neues Jahr~ This is how we say we say "Happy New Year" in the Iron Blood.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander~ let's have a drink~ and two more drinks~ ahh... let's keep going~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hey Commander, why don't we call everyone over and drink together~
skins.secretaryIdle3: The Sakura Empire's sake is truly delicious~ Next time, why don't we ask those stingy girls to let us try some liquor from the Eastern Radiance~
skins.secretaryTouch: You want to drink this? Not~ gonna~ share~

skins.shipDescription: ... Huh? Commander, is that you? Me, drunk? No way... *hic*... If I was, Commander, then what are you planning to do to me? Hehe...
skins.acquisition: ... Huh? Commander, is that you? Me, drunk? No way... *hic*... If I was, Commander, then what are you planning to do to me? Hehe...
skins.login: Commander, did you come to have a drink?
skins.details: Hehe... Commander, that's quite the scandalous expression you've got there... Are you sure you're not drunk, with how red your face is~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Compared to those other stuffy, teetotaling banquets, something a bit more... liberated like this one is much more enjoyable. Don't you agree, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: So, what do you like about me? My personality... or my body? If you lie, I'll make you take a shot~
skins.secretaryIdle3: The Sakura Empire's liquors certainly have a distinctive flavor, but when a girl wants to cut loose, it's gotta be one of the classics~
skins.secretaryTouch: Pfft... You're just too cute when you act all bashful but still can't resist trying to ogle me, ahaha~!
